articles.title: AirAsia X's debt restructuring plan gets full support from Class A creditors - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (Nov 12): AirAsia X Bhd (AAX), which is holding three separate meetings with its scheme creditors on Friday (Nov 12) to vote on its plan to restructure RM63.5 billion of debts, has received full support from Class A creditors.Class A creditors, w…

articles.title: China's Martian satellite begins remote-sensing surveys - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (China Daily/Asia News Network): China's first Martian satellite-the orbiter of the Tianwen 1 mission-has started conducting remote-sensing surveys of the Red Planet, the China National Space Administration said on Monday (Nov 8).
